mapper.select: select Max(grade_level) from grade where std_no=#{std_no}
select Max(grade_semester) from grade where grade_level=#{max_grade_level} and std_no=#{std_no}

select grade_semester, grade_level, grade_year, sum(grade_regcredit) as sum_grade_regcredit, round(avg(grade_getcredit),2) as average_grade_getcredit, round(avg(grade_score),2) as average_grade_score from (select grade_no, grade_regcredit, grade_getcredit, grade_score,grade_semester, grade_level, std_no, g.class_no, to_char(class_startdate,'yyyy') as grade_year from class c, grade g where g.class_no=c.class_no and std_no=#{std_no} and grade_level=#{max_grade_level} and grade_semester=#{max_grade_semester}) group by grade_year,grade_semester,grade_level

select grade_no, grade_regcredit, grade_getcredit, grade_score,grade_semester, grade_level, std_no, g.class_no,to_char(class_startdate,'yyyy') grade_year, class_name, class_type, grade_rank from class c, grade g where g.class_no=c.class_no and std_no=#{std_no} and to_char(class_startdate,'yyyy')=#{year} and grade_semester=#{semester} order by class_name

select std_name, s.std_no, grade_no, grade_getcredit, grade_score, class_type, grade_rank, g.class_no, grade_level, grade_semester,grade_regcredit from class c, grade g, student s where g.class_no=c.class_no and s.std_no=g.std_no and g.class_no=#{class_no} order by std_name
select grade_no,grade_regcredit,grade_getcredit,grade_score,grade_semester,grade_rank, grade_level,std_no,class_no from grade where grade_no=#{grade_no}
